mapper.insert: insert into t_brand ( id, code, name, level, parentCode, fullPath, description, actived, deleted, createdDatetime, updatedDatetime) values( 6, 'RW-', '荣威', 1, null, 'RW-', '荣威', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 7, 'MG-', 'MG', 1, null, 'MG-', 'MG', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 1, 'RW-350', '荣威350', 2, 'RW-', 'RW-/RW-350', '荣威350系列', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 2, 'RW-550', '荣威550', 2, 'RW-', 'RW-/RW-550', '荣威550系列', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 3, 'RW-W5-', '荣威W5', 2, 'RW-', 'RW-/RW-W5-', '荣威W5系列', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 4, 'RW-750', '荣威750', 2, 'RW-', 'RW-/RW-750', '荣威750系列', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} ), ( 5, 'RW-950', '荣威950', 2, 'RW-', 'RW-/RW-950', '荣威950系列', 1, 0, #{createdDatetime}, #{updatedDatetime} );
